languages.text: "Не спрашивай — сам не ведаю. Калькасар ведет себя со своими помощниками, как грибной фермер на Фенрисе — держит во тьме неведения и кормит дерьмом. Он не счел нужным посвятить нас в тайны Ефрата-II, но это и не важно. Что бы там ни было, мы не должны дать презренному малефику завладеть этим".

"Do not ask, for I know not myself. Calcazar treats his allies like a Fenrisian mushroom farmer treats his produce — he keeps them in the dark and feeds them shit. He didn't see fit to enlighten us about the secrets of Eufrates II, but 'tis no matter. Whatever it is, we mustn't let the loathsome malefic claim it."
languages.original_text: "Не спрашивай — сам не ведаю. Калькасар ведет себя со своими помощниками, как грибной фермер на Фенрисе — держит во тьме неведения и кормит дерьмом. Он не счел нужным посвятить нас в тайны Ефрата-II, но это и не важно. Что бы там ни было, мы не должны дать презренному малефику завладеть этим".

languages.text: “这个就别问了，因为我自己也不知道。卡尔卡扎对待他的盟友的态度，就像芬里斯的蘑菇农对待蘑菇一样——把他们蒙在鼓里，喂他们吃屎。他不打算告诉我们欧夫拉茨二号星的秘密，但不要紧。无论这里藏着什么秘密，都不能落在那个该死的异端分子手里。”
languages.original_text: "Do not ask, for I know not myself. Calcazar treats his allies like a Fenrisian mushroom farmer treats his produce — he keeps them in the dark and feeds them shit. He didn't see fit to enlighten us about the secrets of Eufrates II, but 'tis no matter. Whatever it is, we mustn't let the loathsome malefic claim it."

traits.locale_text: “这个就别问了，因为我自己也不知道。卡尔卡扎对待他的盟友的态度，就像芬里斯的蘑菇农对待蘑菇一样——把他们蒙在鼓里，喂他们吃屎。他不打算告诉我们欧夫拉茨二号星的秘密，但不要紧。无论这里藏着什么秘密，都不能落在那个该死的异端分子手里。”
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: « Ne me posez même pas la question, je n'en sais rien. Calcazar traite ses alliés comme un cultivateur de champignons sur Fenris : il les enferme dans l'obscurité et les laisse pourrir. Il n'a pas cru bon de nous dévoiler le secret d'Euphrate-II, mais ça n'a pas d'importance. Quel qu'il soit, nous ne laisserons pas ce scélérat s'en emparer. »
languages.original_text: "Do not ask, for I know not myself. Calcazar treats his allies like a Fenrisian mushroom farmer treats his produce — he keeps them in the dark and feeds them shit. He didn't see fit to enlighten us about the secrets of Eufrates II, but 'tis no matter. Whatever it is, we mustn't let the loathsome malefic claim it."

traits.locale_text: « Ne me posez même pas la question, je n'en sais rien. Il n'a pas cru bon de nous dévoiler le secret d'Euphrate-II, mais ça n'a pas d'importance. Quel qu'il soit, nous ne laisserons pas ce scélérat s'en emparer. »
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: 「俺にもわからない。カルカサルはフェンリスのキノコ農家が農産物を扱うように同盟国を扱っている…周囲で何が起きているのかわからないように、暗い場所に閉じ込めてやがる。奴はユーフラテス・IIの秘密について俺たちに教えてくれなかったが、そんなことはどうでもいい。いずれにせよ、あのクソ野郎に渡すわけにはいかない」
languages.original_text: "Do not ask, for I know not myself. Calcazar treats his allies like a Fenrisian mushroom farmer treats his produce — he keeps them in the dark and feeds them shit. He didn't see fit to enlighten us about the secrets of Eufrates II, but 'tis no matter. Whatever it is, we mustn't let the loathsome malefic claim it."

traits.locale_text: 「俺にもわからない。カルカサルはフェンリスのキノコ農家が農産物を扱うように同盟国を扱っている…周囲で何が起きているのかわからないように、暗い場所に閉じ込めてやがる。奴はユーフラテス・IIの秘密について俺たちに教えてくれなかったが、そんなことはどうでもいい。いずれにせよ、あのクソ野郎に渡すわけにはいかない」
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: «No pregunte, porque no tengo ni idea. Calcazar trata a sus aliados como un granjero de hongos fenrisiano trata su cosecha: los mantiene a oscuras y los alimenta con mierda. No ha tenido a bien informarnos sobre la naturaleza de los secretos de Eufrates II, pero tampoco importa. Sea lo que sea, no podemos permitir que ese monstruo se haga con ello».
languages.original_text: "Do not ask, for I know not myself. Calcazar treats his allies like a Fenrisian mushroom farmer treats his produce — he keeps them in the dark and feeds them shit. He didn't see fit to enlighten us about the secrets of Eufrates II, but 'tis no matter. Whatever it is, we mustn't let the loathsome malefic claim it."

traits.locale_text: «No pregunte, porque no tengo ni idea. Calcazar trata a sus aliados como un granjero de hongos fenrisiano trata su cosecha: los mantiene a oscuras y los alimenta con mierda. No ha tenido a bien informarnos sobre la naturaleza de los secretos de Eufrates II, pero tampoco importa. Sea lo que sea, no podemos permitir que ese monstruo se haga con ello».
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: "Fragt nicht, denn ich weiß es selbst nicht. Calcazar behandelt seine Verbündeten wie ein fenrisischer Pilzbauer sein Pilze — er hält sie im Dunkeln und füttert sie mit Scheiße. Er hat es nicht für nötig gehalten, uns über die Geheimnisse von Eufrates II aufzuklären, doch das ist gleichgültig. Was es auch ist, wir dürfen nicht zulassen, dass der schändliche Schurke es in die Finger bekommt."
languages.original_text: "Do not ask, for I know not myself. Calcazar treats his allies like a Fenrisian mushroom farmer treats his produce — he keeps them in the dark and feeds them shit. He didn't see fit to enlighten us about the secrets of Eufrates II, but 'tis no matter. Whatever it is, we mustn't let the loathsome malefic claim it."

Er hat es nicht für nötig gehalten, uns über die Geheimnisse von Eufrates II aufzuklären, doch das ist gleichgültig. Was es auch ist, wir dürfen nicht zulassen, dass der schändliche Schurke es in die Finger bekommt."
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: "Bana sorma zira cevabı bende değil. Calcazar, müttefiklerine Fenrisli bir mantar çiftçisinin ürünlerine davrandığı gibi davranıyor. Müttefiklerini kuytu köşelerde, karanlıkta bırakıp bokla besliyor. Bizi Eufrates II'nin sırları konusunda aydınlatmaya tenezzül dahi etmedi ancak önemli değil. Ne olursa olsun o menfur şeytanın bunları ele geçirmesine izin veremeyiz."
languages.original_text: "Do not ask, for I know not myself. Calcazar treats his allies like a Fenrisian mushroom farmer treats his produce — he keeps them in the dark and feeds them shit. He didn't see fit to enlighten us about the secrets of Eufrates II, but 'tis no matter. Whatever it is, we mustn't let the loathsome malefic claim it."
